timeline.bodyText:
Use DocumentRoutingConstants#ATTACHED_DOCUMENTS_PROPERTY_NAME?
Also, do we want to sort like in DocumentRoutingServiceImpl#getDocumentRoutesForAttachedDocument?
timeline.author: ataillefer

timeline.bodyText: Is there an alternative to peek? See the Sonar code smell.
timeline.author: ataillefer

replies.author: NourNuxeo

replies.bodyText: Frankly at this point it would be more readable to write a standard for loop.
replies.author: efge

timeline.bodyText: Use isEmpty() to check whether the collection is empty or not.
timeline.author: ataillefer

timeline.bodyText: saveDocument is useless if createDocument was called just before and no property was updated
timeline.author: ataillefer
ataillefer

timeline.bodyText: I would just work with the doc itself and doc#getPropertyValue/doc#setPropertyValue than mixing adapter and session/doc - I find it hardly understandable.
timeline.author: troger

replies.bodyText: Makes it simpler for me as well. I thought it would be more robust to use the adapter.
replies.author: NourNuxeo

timeline.author: troger

replies.bodyText: Just saw @ataillefer comment... I'm still not sure we need to add a sort here...
replies.author: troger

replies.bodyText: I thought if you delete a parent workflow you don't need to check the subworkflows, but now that I think about it, but even if it was to work we would run into DocumentNotFoundException.
replies.author: NourNuxeo

replies.bodyText: In fact, the sorting clause I was talking about was added for the UI, see NXP-11738 and nuxeo-archives/nuxeo-platform-document-routing@bcfa699, so I think it's indeed not relevant here.
replies.author: ataillefer
